#include<stdio.h>

int scan()
{
    int r=0;
    char ch=getchar_unlocked();
    while(ch<'0' || ch>'9')
      ch=getchar_unlocked();
    while(ch>='0' && ch<='9')
      {
          r=(r<<3)+(r<<1)+ch-'0';
          ch=getchar_unlocked();
      }
    return r;
}
 
 int sum(int num)
 {
     int s=0;
     while(num>0)
      {
          s=s+num%10;
          num=num/10;
      }
     return s; 
 }
    
int main(void) {
	int t,i,j,a,b,count;
	int primes[10001]={0};
	primes[0]=1;
	primes[1]=1;
	for(i=2;i<101;i++)
	  {
	      if(primes[i]==0)
	       for(j=2;i*j<10001;j++)
	         primes[i*j]=1;
	  }
	t=scan();
	while(t--)
	  {
	       a=scan();
	       b=scan();
	       count=0;
	       for(i=a;i<=b;i++)    
	        {
	          if(primes[sum(i)]==0)
	           count++;
	        } 
	       printf("%d\n",count);  
	  }
	return 0;
}
